metadata.title: CVE-2019-7251 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An Integer Signedness issue (for a return code) in the res_pjsip_sdp_rtpmodule in Digium Asterisk versions 15.7.1 and earlier and 16.1.1 andearlier allows remote authenticated users to crash Asterisk via a speciallycrafted SDP protocol violation.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
